Plot: A variety of horrible poisonous spiders get exposed to a noxious chemical that causes them to grow to monumental proportions.
Title: Eight Legged Freaks
Writer: Ellory Elkayem (story), Randy Kornfield (story), Jesse Alexander (screenplay), Ellory Elkayem (screenplay)
Actors: David Arquette, Kari Wuhrer, Scott Terra, Scarlett Johansson
tomatoConsensus: This homage to the B-movies of the '50s has a promising first half, but runs out of ideas in the second.
